analysisEngineMetaData.name: knownRelationshipAEDescriptor
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
Annotate known ("pre-defined", or "evidence retrieval") relationships (from a RelationshipStringMapResource) between entities (ie., SemanticAnnotations) within sentences (ie., SyntaxAnnotations) on the CAS.
In general, this will require that a txtfnnl.uima.analysis_component.opennlp.SentenceAnnotator and a KnownEntityAnnotator was used to create the relevant annotations this annotator then combines.

configurationParameter.name: EntityNamespace
configurationParameter.description: The namespace that was used for the entity annotations.

configurationParameter.name: opennlp.uima.SentenceType
configurationParameter.description: The fully qualified name of the sentence annotation type; by default uses the name set at txtfnnl.uima.analysis_component.opennlp.SentenceAnnotator.SENTENCE_TYPE_NAME

configurationParameter.name: RelationshipNamespace
configurationParameter.description: The namespace that will be used for the relationship annotations.

externalResourceDependency.description:
A text file that contains the entities that are known to be in some relationships within each document being processed.
The file format should be TSV, as: 1. documentId 2. entityType 3. namespace 4. identifier with 2. - 4. repeated as often as required.

externalResource.name: DocumentRelationshipList
externalResource.description: A TSV file containing the document ID (SOFA URI basename w/o suffix) and a list of entites (type, namespace, ID) to annotate.
